title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 144 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 144 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Blessed be the LORD my strength, which teacheth my hands to war, and my fingers to fight:
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗）耶和华我的磐石，是应当称颂的。他教导我的手争战，教导我的指头打仗。

lineList.en: My goodness, and my fortress; my high tower, and my deliverer; my shield, and he in whom I trust; who subdueth my people under me.
lineList.cn: 他是我慈爱的主，我的山寨，我的高台，我的救主，我的盾牌，是我所投靠的。他使我的百姓服在我以下。

lineList.en: LORD, what is man, that thou takest knowledge of him! or the son of man, that thou makest account of him!
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，人算什么，你竟认识他。世人算什么，你竟顾念他。

lineList.en: Man is like to vanity: his days are as a shadow that passeth away.
lineList.cn: 人好像一口气。他的年日，如同影儿快快过去。

lineList.en: Bow thy heavens, O LORD, and come down: touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你使天下垂，亲自降临，摸山，山就冒烟。

lineList.en: Cast forth lightning, and scatter them: shoot out thine arrows, and destroy them.
lineList.cn: 求你发出闪电，使他们四散，射出你的箭，使他们扰乱。

lineList.en: Send thine hand from above; rid me, and deliver me out of great waters, from the hand of strange children;
lineList.cn: 求你从上伸手救拔我，救我出离大水，救我脱离外邦人的手。

lineList.en: Whose mouth speaketh vanity, and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood.
lineList.cn: 他们的口说谎话。他们的右手起假誓。

lineList.en: I will sing a new song unto thee, O God: upon a psaltery and an instrument of ten strings will I sing praises unto thee.
lineList.cn: 神阿，我要向你唱新歌，用十弦瑟向你歌颂。

lineList.en: It is he that giveth salvation unto kings: who delivereth David his servant from the hurtful sword.
lineList.cn: 你是那拯救君王的。你是那救仆人大卫脱离害命之刀的。

lineList.en: Rid me, and deliver me from the hand of strange children, whose mouth speaketh vanity, and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood:
lineList.cn: 求你救拔我，救我脱离外邦人的手。他们的口说谎话。他们的右手起假誓。

lineList.en: That our sons may be as plants grown up in their youth; that our daughters may be as corner stones, polished after the similitude of a palace:
lineList.cn: 我们的儿子，从幼年好像树栽子长大。我们的女儿如同殿角石，是按建宫的样式凿成的。

lineList.en: That our garners may be full, affording all manner of store: that our sheep may bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our streets:
lineList.cn: 我们的仓盈满，能出各样的粮食。我们的羊，在田间孳生千万。

lineList.en: That our oxen may be strong to labour; that there be no breaking in, nor going out; that there be no complaining in our streets.
lineList.cn: 我们的牛驮着满驮，没有人闯进来抢夺，也没有人出去争战。我们的街市上，也没有哭号的声音。

lineList.en: Happy is that people, that is in such a case: yea, happy is that people, whose God is the LORD.
lineList.cn: 遇见这光景的百姓，便为有福。有耶和华为他们的神，这百姓便为有福。
